name: Battle for Dice Tower Hill
description:
The devious Deck Kingdom has declared war on the denizens of Dicelandia! The last remaining strong hold of Dice Tower Hill is our only hope to fend off the invaders. Grow dice in the nearby land, collect it with the helicopter, and send those brave soldiers flying at the enemy!

Controls:

  • Click to plant
  • Click to harvest
  • WASD to control the camera
  • Drag to load dice into the tower
  • F11 to enter fullscreen

Tiles:

  • Red tiles cause dice size to grow faster
  • Yellow tiles produce more dice
  • Blue tiles are normal grow areas
  • Grey tiles cannot grow dice

Contributers:

  • ect
